svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-06-19T17:12:04.441Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/114.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="yaZf6w5Zk11cvfN2oBr0" version="21.5.0" type="device"> <diagram name="Сторінка-1" id="wXlha0TSSufLrcm5ZKi2"> <mxGraphModel dx="2206" dy="1225" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-1" value="Player<br>" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="10" width="50" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-3" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;endArrow=block;endFill=0;endSize=12;verticalAlign=bottom;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-1"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="330" y="330" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="350" y="190" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-4" value="Click on a button<br>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="270" y="190" width="140" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-5" value="&lt;&lt;include&gt;&gt;" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;endArrow=open;verticalAlign=bottom;dashed=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-4" target="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-6"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="330" y="330" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="370" y="340" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-6" value="Buttons" style="shape=rect;html=1;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1;whiteSpace=wrap;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="180" y="310" width="400" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-12" value="Text-To-Speech<br>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="460" y="370" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-13" value="NightMode" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="420" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-14" value="Surprise mechanics" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="190" y="420" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-15" value="Time Rush" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="340" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-16" value="Hints<br>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="190" y="340" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-18" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;endArrow=block;endFill=0;endSize=12;verticalAlign=bottom;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-16"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="100" y="280" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="90" y="400" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-19" value="GIves hints like<br>starts with * ends with &amp;" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="360" width="130" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-23" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;endArrow=none;verticalAlign=bottom;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-14"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="90" y="570" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="250" y="500" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-24" value="Randomly you can get more or less money according to your choise of multiplier" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="555" width="130" height="95" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-25" value="You can choose between NIght and Light mode" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="572.5" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-26" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;endArrow=none;verticalAlign=bottom;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-25"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="380" y="480" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="540" y="480" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-27" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;endArrow=none;verticalAlign=bottom;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="420" y="345" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="640" y="335" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-28" value="Mechanics that gives you more money for less time spent on finding words&nbsp;" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="620" y="310" width="120" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-29" value="Reads all text on interface" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="620" y="513" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-30" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;endArrow=none;verticalAlign=bottom;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-29"> <mxGeometry width="160" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="530" y="430" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="690" y="430" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-31" value="&lt;&lt;include&gt;&gt;" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;endArrow=open;verticalAlign=bottom;dashed=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-33"> id="BSWI6azZ0aZCF1_JdEcg-33" value="Interface buttons with letters<br>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="510" y="80" width="140" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
